abstracts.cdata!:
This loan was originally approved in
            August 1965 (see reports TO483 and P443). Before signing,
            however, Singapore separated from Malaysia. Resubmission of
            the loan awaited Singapore's becoming a member in its
            own right. The main item in the Singapore Port Project is
            the construction of four deep water berths. Other items
            include a new port engineer's plant yard and workshop,
            replacement and provision of additional floating craft and
            cargo handling equipment, and provision of data processing
            equipment. Purchase of all major items of imported equipment
            and the awarding of all major construction contracts will be
            on the basis of international competitive bidding.
